syllabus:
【Teaching method: 16+2 weeks】

This course is mainly to provide students with a platform for optoelectronic engineering and technology discussion and to share ideas and discussions with experts and scholars to further stimulate the learning field to further broaden the learning and mutual learning effect. Students can share and report their experiences through the lectures of academic experts, current research progress reports, and research journal articles.

Week1        Introduction

Week2-15   Sharing by experts and scholars

Week16       Final report

Week17-18  Self-learning

methodologies.note: Invite experts and scholars to give speeches
The course adopts open-ended discussion, encourages students to ask questions and gives extra points.
Open discussion allows published students to address their problems.
